# 41st Golden Bell Awards

The 41st Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第41屆金鐘獎) was held on December 20, 2006 at the Kaohsiung Social Education Hall in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by Azio TV.
